dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :GT_CAGC GRADETEXT_CAGC, :GT_CGC GRADETEXT_CGC, :GT_IACC GRADETEXT_IACC, :GT_IG GRADETEXT_IG, :GT_WAIG GRADETEXT_WAIG, :P_RUN draft_final FROM DUAL

SELECT DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.TRANSLOADER LOCATION CODE' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('XL2147T','XL2347T','COASTAL','SALMVIT') AND cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') trans_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('YSB','YC') AND cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') ysb_yc_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('SRWW','HRWW','SWW','DNSW') AND cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') wheat_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('SRWW','HRWW','SWW','DNSW','BLY') AND cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') wheat_bly_exists FROM DUAL

SELECT DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%AFLATOXIN%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%AFLATOXIN%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') afla_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%PROTEIN%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%PROTEIN%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') protein_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%OIL%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%OIL%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') oil_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%VOMITOXIN%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%VOMITOXIN%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') vomo_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON orel.order_base_gid = ob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%FALLING NUMBER%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.RELATED PURCHASE ORDER RELEASE NUMBER' INNER JOIN order_release orel ON orel.order_release_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', ssur.refnum_value) INNER JOIN ob_order_base ob ON ob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.GRADE%' AND obr.ob_refnum_value LIKE '%FALLING NUMBER%' WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') fall_exists, DECODE( (SELECT DISTINCT 'YES' FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN ship_group_refnum sgr ON cv.charter_voyage_xid = sgr.ship_group_refnum_value AND sgr.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN ship_group sg ON sgr.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('SRWW','HRWW','SWW','DNSW','YSB','YC','NS','HWW','BLY') AND cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID),'YES','YES',NULL,'NO','NO') commodity_exists FROM DUAL

SELECT SHIP_GROUP_GID, SHIP_GROUP_XID, TRANSLOADER, FGIS_REQUIRED, LOC_CODE, ORIG_CONTACT, TRANS_CONTACT, SPEC_CONTACT, ADDITIONAL_NOTES FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE (GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER( (SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = (SELECT charter_voyage_xid FROM charter_voyage WHERE charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID ) ))) )

SELECT SHIP_GROUP_GID, SHIP_GROUP_XID, CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID, CHARTER_VOYAGE_XID, SHIPMENT_GID, SHIPMENT_XID, TRANSLOADER_BOOKING, CONTAINER_DESC, COMMODITY_CODE, LOAD_PORT, DISCHARGE_PORT, CUTOFF_DATE, SAIL_DATE, BOOKING_NUMBER, SHIP_LINE, VESSEL, PICKUP_LOCATION, DROPOFF_LOCATION, EARLIEST_PICKUP_DATE, EARLIEST_DROPOFF_DATE FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_SHIPMENT( (SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = (SELECT charter_voyage_xid FROM charter_voyage WHERE charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID ) ))) )

SELECT DISTINCT obr.ob_refnum_value FROM ship_group sg INNER JOIN ship_group_d sgd ON sgd.ship_group_gid = sg.ship_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON (s.shipment_gid = sgd.shipment_gid AND s.consol_gid IS NULL) INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON oob.order_base_gid = ssul.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum obr ON obr.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.EQUIPMENT_CONSTRAINT_TEXT' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN consol c ON c.charter_voyage_gid = CONCAT('SCOULAR/BCO.', sref.shipment_refnum_value) INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON c.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID

SELECT remark_text AS DOCUMENT_DESC FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_DOCS_REQ( (SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = (SELECT charter_voyage_xid FROM charter_voyage WHERE charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID ) ))) )

SELECT ship_group_gid, specification_desc, specification_value FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_SPECS( (SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = (SELECT charter_voyage_xid FROM charter_voyage WHERE charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID ) ))) )

SELECT ship_group_gid, treatment_desc FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_TREATMENTS( (SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = (SELECT charter_voyage_xid FROM charter_voyage WHERE charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID ) ))) )

SELECT ship_group_gid, ship_group_xid, lab_gid, lab_name, full_address, phone, sample_size FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_BCO_LOAD_ORDER.FUNC_LOAD_ORDER_LABS( (SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = (SELECT charter_voyage_xid FROM charter_voyage WHERE charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID ) ))) )

SELECT COUNT(*) Image_Total FROM document doc, document_content doc_con WHERE doc.document_gid = doc_con.document_content_gid AND document_gid LIKE ( SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = ( SELECT charter_voyage_xid FROM charter_voyage WHERE charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID ) ) || '_LAB%'

SELECT blob_content image1 FROM document doc, document_content doc_con WHERE doc.document_gid = doc_con.document_content_gid AND document_gid LIKE ( SELECT ship_group_gid FROM ship_group_refnum WHERE ship_group_refnum_qual_gid='CHARTER VOYAGE' AND ship_group_refnum_value = ( SELECT charter_voyage_xid FROM charter_voyage WHERE charter_voyage_gid = :BOOKING_ID ) ) || '_LAB%'
